<P>baibasuta manu agastiGki kale pAda pUjA

<P>pAdAarghya dile ye manu mahArAjA | 1 |

<P>basana kuNDaLa dhUpa dIpa naibedya

<P>nabatana yogADa basana ratnamAna sAdhya | 2 |

<P>zarIra nirmaLa hoilA taba mukhuM zuNi | 3 |

<P1>pUbong pruSThAra abaziSTAMza :--

<P1>se zarIra goTi agnire dAha kari

<P1>nabatana kAy1e puNihiM abatari ||

<P1>aneka pIrati tAGku kale yignasenI
